name: 尤尚邦
objective:
本課程是為了培養學生自主學習的能力，由學生主動提出自己有興趣之主題。學生於特定主題中，學習到思考與問題解決的能力。教師擔任輔助指導角色，引導學生從實踐中學習。學生根據自己的興趣與能力訂定學習計畫，於開學前向辦公室提出申請。由專任老師擔任指導教師，審查及評核學期成績。
This course is to cultivate students' self-learning ability, and students take the initiative to put forward topics they are interested in. Students learn the ability to think and solve problems in specific topics. Teachers play the role of auxiliary guidance to guide students to learn from practice. Students formulate learning plans based on their interests and abilities, and apply to the office before the start of the semester. The full-time teacher acts as the instructor to review and evaluate the semester results.
schedule: 依照學生自主學習規劃，每週定期討論。
scorePolicy: 依照每週進度之完成度以及期中期末報告為評量依據
materials: 教師與學生共同決定教材
remarks: 教師諮商時間與聯絡請以 email 聯絡預約。

name: 陳柏端
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下，進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。
The topic of the special projects is discussed and together by the students and advisor. Under the face-to -face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.
schedule:
1-9 周 資料收集
10-18 周 討論和結報撰寫
consultation: 無授課需求，以實體和線上討論。
